casebody.data:
Stephen A. Miller
v.
Joy Kiss et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2016

Stephen A. Miller, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Christopher M. Connelly, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn. App. 734,165 Conn. App. 734 (2016), is denied.
